DriftX is just getting started. More features coming soon!

Start with DriftX now >

Key Features

DriftX offers automated trading, ultra-fast execution, and cross-platform integration to help you seize every opportunity on Solana. With a user-friendly interface and smart profit optimization, it's perfect for both beginners and experienced traders.

Automated Trading
DeiftX front-runs and back-runs trades automatically.
Ultra-Fast Execution
Uses the Jito validator for the fastest possible trades.
Cross-Platform Integration
Works with Jupiter, Raydium, and Orca for more opportunities.
User-Friendly
Ideal for both beginners and experienced traders.
Profit Optimization
Places strategic orders to maximize earnings.
Pricing & Fees

DriftX offers a transparent and simple pricing structure designed to ensure that you only pay when you profit. With a low minimum deposit and no hidden costs, you can start trading with confidence and focus on growing your earnings.

Minimum Deposit

Begin your automated trading journey with as little as 2 SOL, giving you access to DriftX.

Simple Fee Structure

We charge a 2% profit fee, with no hidden costs, ensuring full transparency.

FAQs – New to MEV bots?

Our FAQ section is here to guide you through the basics of automated trading and MEV bots, helping you get started with DriftX quickly.

What is a Mevbot, and how does it work?

MEV (Maximal Extractable Value) refers to the profits that can be captured by reordering, including, or excluding transactions within a block. DriftX automates this process for you, ensuring optimal profits.

How do I get started with DriftX?

Simply deposit at least 2 SOL, and our bot will automatically start trading for you. You can monitor your performance in real time.

Is there a minimum deposit requirement?

Yes, the minimum deposit to start trading with the Solana bot is 2 SOL.

What fees does DriftX charge?

DriftX only charges a 2% fee on profits, with no hidden fees.

Can beginners use DriftX?

Absolutely! DriftX, the Solana bot, is designed to be user-friendly for both beginners and experienced traders alike.
